text: "I'm Gonna Love You Anyway" is a song recorded by American country music artist Trace Adkins. It was released in July 2000 as the third and final single from the album More.... The song reached #36 on the Billboard Hot Country Singles & Tracks chart. The song was written by Stacy Dean Campbell and Dean Miller. ==Chart performance== {|class="wikitable sortable" !align="left"|Chart (2000) !align="center"|Peak position |- |} ==References== Category:2000 singles Category:1999 songs Category:Trace Adkins songs Category:Songs written by Dean Miller Category:Capitol Records Nashville singles
title: I'm Gonna Love You Anyway
